MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task PullAsync (this Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MobileServices.Sync.IMobileServiceSyncTable table, string queryId, string query);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task PullAsync(class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MobileServices.Sync.IMobileServiceSyncTable table, string queryId, string query) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function PullAsync (table As IMobileServiceSyncTable, queryId As String, query As String) As Task
static member PullAsync : Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MobileServices.Sync.IMobileServiceSyncTable * string * string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The instance of table to execute pull on.

A string that uniquely identifies this query and is used to keep track of its sync state. Supplying this parameter enables incremental sync whenever the same key is used again. Must be 25 characters or less and contain only alphanumeric characters, dash, and underscore.
An OData query that determines which items to pull from the remote table.
Docs.summary: Pulls all items that match the given query from the associated remote table. Supports incremental sync.
Docs.returns: A task that completes when pull operation has finished.
Docs.exception: Thrown when does not match the regular expression [a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,24}.
